type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Writing and defence of the Master's Thesis.

objectives.en: The goal of master's thesis is to give an opportunity for students to gain necessary experience in research work together with reporting and presentation skills, by solving a theoretical or practical problem under guidance.
objectives.et: Magistritöö (30 EAP) eesmärk on anda üliõpilasele uurimistöö ja selle tulemuste kirjaliku vormistamise ning suulise ettekandmise kogemus teoreetilise või praktilise probleemi lahendamise kaudu.

learning_outcomes.en: As a result of defending the Master's thesis, the student:
learning_outcomes.et: Magistritöö kirjutamise ja kaitsmise tulemusena üliõpilane:

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to apply the acquired knowledge in formulating scientific problems and select suitable theoretical methods for their analysis, is able to present his/her research results;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab rakendada omandatud teadmisi teadusprobleemide sõnastamisel, oskab valida probleemi lahendamiseks sobiva meetodi ning oma tulemusi korrektselt ja arusaadavalt esitada;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to search and analyze relevant scientific literature and is able to synthesize new professional knowledge from it and from scientific data collected by him/ her;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab leida ja analüüsida teaduslikku infot ning suudab sellest ja enda poolt kogutud teaduslikest andmetest sünteesida uusi erialaseid teadmisi;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to critically analyse the various standpoints published in the special literature;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kriitiliselt analüüsida erialakirjanduses avaldatud seisukohti;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to present own standpoints, conclusions and generalisations, and also justify these with arguments;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab esitada oma seisukohti, järeldusi ning üldistusi ja neid argumenteeritult põhjendada;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to prepare and deliver a public presentation and express himself orally and in writing in his or her specialty and defend his or her views.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab koostada ja pidada avalikku ettekannet ning end väljendada oma erialal nii suuliselt kui ka kirjalikult.

description.et: The grade is based on the content (difficulty of the subject, contributions of the author) of the thesis. Submission: 17.01.2024 to ltms_kantselei@ut.ee

The grade is based on the correctness and clarity of the presentation about the content of the thesis and of the answers to the questions.
https://ut-ee.zoom.us/j/92413712639?pwd=MdBpYoXEuwgPW44icLHYb1JTiezllg.1

grade_preconditions.et:
Magistritöö osaliseks arvestamiseks (10 EAP) peab üliõpilane esitama lõputöö kavandi, mis koosneb järgmistest osadest:
1) tiitelleht
2) sissejuhatus koos probleemi püstituse ja töö eesmärkidega
3) magistritöö sisukord
4) andmete kirjeldus (empiirilise töö puhul)
5) esialgsed tulemused
6) kokkuvõte senistest tulemustest
7) olulised kirjandusviited
8) juhendaja nõusolek magistritöö osaliseks arvestamiseks (allkiri tiitellehel).

For partial recognition of the thesis (10 ECTS), student must submit the draft of the thesis, which consists of the following parts:
1) title page
2) introduction with the formulation of the problem and the objectives of the thesis
3) table of contents
4) description of data (in case of empirical work)
5) preliminary results
6) summary of current results
7) relevant bibliography
8) supervisor's agreement for partial recognition of the thesis (signature on title page).

grade_evaluation.et:
Magistritöö osaliseks arvestamiseks toimub lõputöö kavandi avalik kaitsmine.
Public presentation about the (partial) content of the thesis.

debt_elimination.et:
Vastavalt ÕKE-le
According to study regulation rules of UT.
